H0.text: who dies in transformers revenge of the fallen. Optimus Prime

H1.text: who dies in transformers revenge of the fallen. Megatron

H2.text: who dies in transformers revenge of the fallen. Bumblebee

H3.text: who dies in transformers revenge of the fallen. Jetfire

A4.text: Megatron attempts to seize the AllSpark, but Sam Witwicky shoves it into his exposed spark chamber, killing him.

A5.text: Jetfire sacrifices himself to give Optimus his parts, and then Megatron, and the Fallen battle Optimus.

A6.text: Optimus battles Megatron, Starscream, and Grindor, killing the latter, but is killed by Megatron while defending Sam.

A7.text: Optimus Prime is brainwashed by Quintessa, Optimus fights on the ship with Bumblebee, the latter regaining his voice, enabling Optimus to remember him and his allies.

A8.text: Following the battle, he stays with Sam and Mikaela as a guardian and friend.

A9.text: When Optimus Prime dies at the hands of the Decepticon super-weapon, the Hydra Cannon
